body_html:
I meet the same problem. @taotaolin @meteorcloudy @Roffild
I use the tensorflow\bazel-bin\tensorflow\libtensorflow.so.if.lib in VS 2015. And there are errors.
error LNK2001: 无法解析的外部符号 "private: void __cdecl tensorflow::Tensor::CopyFromInternal(class tensorflow::Tensor const &,class tensorflow::TensorShape const &)" (?CopyFromInternal@Tensor@tensorflow@@AEAAXAEBV12@AEBVTensorShape@2@@Z)
Does anyone know how to use the libtensorflow_cc.so??

我也编译好了.so了，这个不难，但是好了之后不知道怎么用，这个困难！

body:
> I meet the same problem. @taotaolin @meteorcloudy @Roffild
> I use the `tensorflow\bazel-bin\tensorflow\libtensorflow.so.if.lib` in VS 2015. And there are errors.
> `error LNK2001: 无法解析的外部符号 "private: void __cdecl tensorflow::Tensor::CopyFromInternal(class tensorflow::Tensor const &,class tensorflow::TensorShape const &)" (?CopyFromInternal@Tensor@tensorflow@@AEAAXAEBV12@AEBVTensorShape@2@@Z)`
> Does anyone know how to use the libtensorflow_cc.so??

我也编译好了.so了，这个不难，但是好了之后不知道怎么用，这个困难！
